title: Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description:
Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work. 

Description: When setting the color to orange, it doesn't work.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.

Observed behavior (OB): The color does not appear as orange.
Expected behavior (EB): The color should appear as orange.
Steps to reproduce (SR):
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.
OB: The color does not appear as orange.
EB: The color should appear as orange.
SR:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.
